item.title: 南非国家警察称南非将实现或超过预算赤字目标
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）表示，由于支出受到限制，税收更为健康，南非有望实现国库对本财年预算赤字的预期，或取得更为有利的结果。【原文：South Africa is on track to attain the National Treasury’s projected budget deficit for the current fiscal year, or achieve an even more-favorable outcome, due to restrained expenditure and healthier tax collections, BNP Paribas said.】

item.title: 在 7.875 亿美元首次公开募股后，Figure 表示将高开 36
item.description: 据悉，基于区块链的信贷公司Figure Technology Solutions Inc.在上市融资7.875亿美元后，其股票的交易价格将比首次公开募股价格高出36%，加入了加密行业公司拥抱公开市场的行列。【原文：Shares of blockchain-based credit company Figure Technology Solutions Inc. are indicated to start trading 36% above their IPO price after a listing raising $787.5 million, joining a cohort of crypto sector companies in embracing public markets.】

item.title: 壳牌液化天然气工厂入选卡尼青睐的项目名单
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）希望加快加拿大液化天然气公司（LNG Canada）的大规模扩建工程，这是加拿大西海岸的一个大型液化天然气出口项目。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney wants to speed construction of a major expansion of LNG Canada, a large-scale liquefied natural gas export project on Canada’s west coast.】

item.title: 两次下调评级后苹果分析师情绪创五年新低
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. was hit with a pair of downgrades on Thursday, in the latest sign of caution toward the iPhone maker, which has sharply underperformed its large-cap tech peers this year.】

item.title: 小包装关税给 UPS 带来痛苦，博雅将其评级下调至卖出
item.description: 在全球贸易动荡的背景下，美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service Inc.美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：United Parcel Service Inc. shares have been pummeled, losing more than a third of their value this year, amid an upheaval in global trade. Bank of America Corp. says its time to sell.】

item.title: 波兰因公共债务激增面临惠誉下调信用评级的风险
item.description: 惠誉评级公司副董事米兰-特拉伊科维奇（Milan Trajkovic）表示，如果波兰不能稳定政府债务水平或保持经济增长势头，惠誉评级公司可能会下调波兰的主权评级。【原文：Fitch Ratings may downgrade Poland’s sovereign score if the country fails to stabilize its government debt level or maintain economic growth momentum, according to Milan Trajkovic, an associate director at the rating company.】

item.title: CPI 报告助推交易员对降息的押注，股市再度上涨
item.description: 周四股市开盘攀升，盘中创下新纪录，因为投资者预计通胀报告将触发美联储下周降息。【原文：Equities climbed at the open on Thursday, touching new intraday records as investors expect an in-line inflation report to trigger a Federal Reserve interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 两家市值数十亿美元的公司开启欧洲首次公开募股窗口
item.description: 本周，欧洲首次公开募股的窗口正式打开，大量公司上市表明，今年早些时候因关税引发的谨慎情绪已经过去，这种谨慎情绪曾扰乱了交易。【原文：The window for initial public offerings in Europe has opened in earnest this week, with a flurry of listings indicating the tariff-induced caution that disrupted deals earlier in the year has passed.】

item.title: 交易员押注欧洲央行可能已完成降息
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，该地区的增长风险更加平衡，通货紧缩进程已经结束，交易员们认为欧洲央行的降息周期很可能已经结束。【原文：Traders are betting the European Central Bank’s interest rate-cutting cycle has likely come to an end after President Christine Lagarde said growth risks in the region are more balanced and the disinflationary process is over.】

item.title: 德意志银行称看好房利美和房地美上市前景
item.description: 德意志银行认为，联邦国民抵押贷款协会和联邦住房贷款抵押公司的股票将进一步上涨，因为人们预期这两家抵押贷款巨头有可能在不久的将来摆脱政府的控制。【原文：Deutsche Bank sees shares of Federal National Mortgage Association and Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp. gaining further on expectations the mortgage giants will possibly be released from government control in the near future.】

item.title: PAI 和 ICG 据称将签署 Infra 集团股权出售协议，价值 30 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧洲收购公司 PAI Partners 将其持有的 Infra 集团部分股份出售给了由当前股东 ICG Plc 牵头的投资者集团，该交易对这家基础设施服务提供商的估值约为 30 亿欧元（35 亿美元）。【原文：European buyout firm PAI Partners sold a part of its stake in Infra Group to a group of investors led by current shareholder ICG Plc, in a transaction valuing the infrastructure services provider at about €3 billion ($3.5 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财富与工作引发愤怒，ICE突袭现代工厂
item.description: 位于佐治亚州的电池厂遭到移民突袭，颠覆了美国和韩国之间的关系，在此之前，当地人的怨恨与日俱增，他们认为该工厂创造的就业机会、经济机遇和财富被排除在外，而该工厂是现代汽车公司斥资 76 亿美元建造的大型制造综合体的一部分。【原文：Before the immigration raid on the battery plant in Georgia that’s upended relations between the US and South Korea, there was growing resentment from locals who felt left out of the jobs, economic opportunities and wealth created by the factory, part of a massive $7.6 billion manufacturing complex anchored by Hyundai Motor Co.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计美国回购再增 6000 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：US share buybacks could increase by $600 billion over the coming years as repurchases limit the supply of stocks, according to strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 美国国债上涨，数据好坏参半，美联储减息政策保持不变
item.description: 国债震荡，收益率最终走低，因为消费者物价和劳动力市场的读数使美联储下周减息的前景保持不变。【原文：Treasuries oscillated with yields ultimately pushing lower as readings on consumer prices and the labor market left intact the prospect of Federal Reserve cuts next week.】

item.title: 美国首次申请失业救济人数跃升至近四年来最高水平
item.description: 上周，美国失业救济金申请人数跃升至近四年来的最高水平，表明在招聘急剧放缓的情况下，裁员活动可能正在增加。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits jumped last week to the highest level in almost four years, indicating layoff activity may be on the rise amid a sharp slowdown in hiring.】

item.title: 美国核心消费者物价指数如期上涨，美联储有望继续降息
item.description: 美国 8 月份基本通胀率如期上升，使美联储有望在下周降息。【原文：Underlying US inflation rose as expected in August, keeping the Federal Reserve on track to cut interest rates next week.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在通胀得到控制、经济保持稳定的情况下维持利率不变
item.description: 欧洲中央银行在第二次会议上维持借贷成本不变，认为尽管美国提高了关税，但通胀压力得到控制，经济稳健。【原文：The European Central Bank kept borrowing costs unchanged for a second meeting, deeming inflationary pressure contained and the economy solid despite heftier US tariffs.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将于 2026 年冻结大部分国家招聘，以遏制工资法案
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部表示，津巴布韦政府明年将冻结大部分部门的招聘工作，以控制国家工资支出。【原文：Zimbabwe’s government will freeze recruitment in most of its departments next year to contain the state wage bill, the nation’s finance ministry said.】

item.title: Cinven 校友在二级市场基金中寻找折扣股权
item.description: 投资者对二级基金趋之若鹜，二级基金购买私募股权投资机构的二手股权。现在，这一概念又向前迈进了一步，所谓的三级基金以折扣价从二级基金的投资者手中购买现有股份。【原文：Investors have been flocking to secondaries funds, which buy second-hand stakes in private equity vehicles. Now, the concept is being taken a step further with so-called tertiary funds that buy existing stakes at a discount from investors in secondary funds.】

item.title: 尽管供应增加，欧佩克仍认为石油市场紧张
item.description: 欧佩克继续预测今明两年全球石油市场将出现巨大的供应缺口，即使该组织恢复了生产，但这一观点与更广泛的行业存在冲突。【原文：OPEC continued to project a substantial supply deficit in global oil markets this year and next even as the group revives production, a view that clashes with the wider industry.】

item.title: 次级汽车贷款公司倒闭给高风险债务市场带来重创
item.description: 得克萨斯州一家次级汽车贷款公司的突然倒闭，从边境小镇的经销商一直到华尔街上层都掀起了惊涛骇浪，摩根大通和贝莱德等巨头也被卷入其中，这让人们担心，数十亿美元的捆绑式汽车贷款市场的痛苦正在开始加剧。【原文：The sudden collapse of a Texas subprime car lender is sending shock waves from border-town dealerships all the way to the upper echelons of Wall Street, ensnaring giants including JPMorgan Chase and BlackRock and raising concern that pain in the multibillion-dollar market for bundled auto loans is starting to mount.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为乌克兰到 2027 年的资金缺口高达 200 亿美元
item.description: 国际货币基金组织已经确定，乌克兰未来两年的资金需求可能比基辅政府估计的高出 200 亿美元，因为确保下一个援助计划的谈判即将开始。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has determined that Ukraine’s funding needs over the next two years may be as much as $20 billion higher than the government in Kyiv estimates as talks to secure the next aid package are set to begin.】

item.title: 乌克兰在与国际货币基金组织进行预算谈判期间延长利率暂停期
item.description: 由于通货膨胀率居高不下，乌克兰寻求国际货币基金组织提供更多援助以支撑战时预算，乌克兰央行第四次会议维持基准利率不变。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank held the benchmark interest rate for a fourth meeting as inflation remains high and the nation seeks more aid from the International Monetary Fund to shore up its war-time budget.】

item.title: 土耳其不顾华尔街押注，大幅削减开支超预期
